<abstract>In Memory, a Web Site produced by Liz Wiemann, is part of the Library of Congress September 11 Web Archive and preserves the web expressions of individuals, groups, the press and institutions in the United States and from around the world in the aftermath of the attacks in the United States on September 11, 2001.</abstract>
<subject>
				
<topic>September 11 Terrorist Attacks, 2001</topic>
			
</subject>
